alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Decatur; Lucas; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:43AM CST until February 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Extended Period of Wintry Precipitation across much of Iowa Continues this Morning... .A long duration of mainly light wintry precipitation will continue to impact Iowa this morning. The wintry mix is expected to transition to snow north by Tuesday morning in northern areas and freezing drizzle may continue through portions of central and southern Iowa. The morning commute may be affected for many locations due to either snow covered or icy roads, especially if left untreated. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle. A light glaze up to around a tenth of an inch of ice. A dusting of snow may be seen as well. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery walkways and road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 5 1 1 app or dial 5 1 1.
